title: aoluain
author: aoluain
created_time: March 23, 2023, 09:26:59 PMLast edit: June 30, 2023, 09:14:17 PM by aoluain
content: For anyone who missed the Bitcoin Colouring Poster collaboration you can catch itat the link to get up to speed with how it came about >https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5412649.msg60895256#msg60895256*not the final artworkThis OP it to gauge interest in the limited print run of 21 copies 10 copies.The first 7 copies will be reserved for the 7 contributors who helped out withthe colouring project, they are in order of the draw to pick the contributors:Print #1. haloxonPrint #2. Peak DKPrint #3. Suzuki MattPrint #4. bitbolloPrint #5. MoparMiningLLCPrint #6. Hookzup1Print #7. rhomelmabiniThis leaves 14 13 for sale @ BTC0.00084You can post your comment or make a booking, I really want to sell all 14 copiesrather than going to the trouble and expense of printing and then having them sitting here.*if I cannot sell 13 I will print the 7 copies as promised for the 7 contributors . . . and 1 for myself!PRESENTATION:These will be a single sided print [Test print to follow shortly]Bearing in mind the expense of getting these posted I have two options of presentingthese as a final product 1.] A1 print folded to A4 size + Single sided A4 cover sheet all in a grip sealed plastic bag.Postal cost similar to that of the Bitcoin Colouring BookQuote from: aoluain on July 15, 2022, 10:53:16 AMPostage [WITH TRACKING]1 book – EU $10 | USA, Canada, India & Pakistan $12 | South America, New Zealand & Australia $14  2 books – EU $12 | USA, Canada, India & Pakistan $15 | South America, New Zealand & Australia $18  2.] A1 print rolled into an A2 postal tubePostal cost to be determined but I'm guessing more expensive than folded flat.

comments.author: Cyrus
comments.body: What a great idea! One for me please.And please roll it instead of folding it. Even if the cost is higher, it sure is worth it to avoid creases.

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: Thank you Cyrus!Ok there doesnt seem to be any appetite for this so apart from the 7 prints for the 7 contributors I will print 1 extra for myself and another for Cyrus and one extra for a raffle at a later stage, total of 10.I will also get an initial test print ran to check the quality so there will be at least 1 test print also.I will work on the final artwork this week and update the thread with that and hopefullyget the copies ran at the end of the week too, all going well.

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: I have finalised the poster layout, tidied up some borders and erased some marks outsidethe borders, I have sent the artwork to the printers so hopefully I will get a test sheetby the weekend to check in full size the quality.I have also designed the A4 cover sheet which will accompany each copy, it's basically a rehashed colouring book cover!Each print and cover sheet will be hand numbered.So can @haloxon, @Peak DK, @Suzuki Matt, @bitbollo, @MoparMiningLLC, @Hookzup1 and @rhomelmabini let me know if you want a rolled or folded print.

comments.author: Suzuki Matt
comments.body: This is so cool. I would like rolled please. Thank you for including me in this. I had alot of fun doing it.

comments.author: aoluain
comments.created_time: June 05, 2023, 05:22:17 PMLast edit: June 06, 2023, 05:46:26 AM by aoluain
comments.body: FINALLY an update...The final artwork has been sent to the printer . . . 10 minutes ago! Apologies for the delay, I wasnt being lazy, just tight on finances to get these printed, packed and posted.I might be able to pick these up before the weekend and possibly post them on Saturday,all going well.Can you guys let me know what way you want the poster delivered, flat or rolled?Also please send me your postal address, @MoparMiningLLC - I have yours! I know allof you gave me your addresses already but I dont keep them . . . obviously apart from mopar because he sent the address by pm . . . and there it sitshaloxon - rolledPeak DK Suzuki Matt - rolledbitbolloMoparMiningLLC  - rolledHookzup1rhomelmabiniIf anyone wants to contribute to the postage costs it would be most welcome, someone already offered this but its really OK if you dont want to! - just send me a pm or put it in the privnote with the address.registered postage is €14

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: aoluain on June 05, 2023, 05:22:17 PMFINALLY an update...The final artwork has been sent to the printer . . . 10 minutes ago! Apologies for the delay, I wasnt being lazy, just tight on finances to get these printed, packed and posted.I might be able to pick these up before the weekend and possibly post them on Saturday,all going well.Can you guys let me know what way you want the poster delivered, flat or rolled?Also please send me your postal address, @MoparMiningLLC - I have yours! I know allof you gave me your addresses already but I dont keep them . . . obviously apart from mopar because he sent the address by pm . . . and there it sitshaloxon - rolledPeak DK Suzuki Matt - rolledbitbollo MoparMiningLLC Hookzup1rhomelmabiniIf anyone wants to contribute to the postage costs it would be most welcome, someone already offered this but its really OK if you dont want to! - just send me a pm or put it in the privnote with the address.registered postage is €14rolled is great!

comments.author: aoluain
comments.created_time: June 30, 2023, 09:07:12 PMLast edit: July 06, 2023, 05:38:09 AM by aoluain
comments.body: Finally, I am in possession of these prints, I will be posting 3 prints tomorrow to haloxon, Cyrus and MoparMiningLLC. I'll send a PM to you all with your tracking numbers over the weekend.I'll PM everyone else for their postal addresses.haloxon - rolled - posted 01/07/2023Peak DK - folded - ready to postSuzuki Matt - rolled - posted 03/07/2023bitbollo - rolled - posted 03/07/2023MoparMiningLLC  - rolled - posted 01/07/2023Hookzup1 - rolled - ready to postrhomelmabiniCyrus - rolled - Posted 01/07/2023

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Received mine today - thank you! Can you remind me why one picture is uncolored? If I recall, were there not 11 people coloring a picture?

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: Great Mopar!I suggest if re-rolling it to use the tube as a guide, its a big poster and can crease easily!Regarding the blank, initially the idea was to have a blank that anyone who purchased a copycould colour a section . . . or not. The poster paper though is coatedso not all media would go on it.There was only 7 of you guys who won the chance to contribute to the poster, so a limitedclub on a very limited project fwiw
